attributes.action: stop paying any benefits to immigrants who have never worked in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: no one who has never put anything into the system should be allowed to claim any benefits until they have worked and payed in for a qualifying period.we should be like Australia and only let people in who have something to offer this country,have a job to go too,housing sorted out .this country cant keep absorbing the amount of immigrants at the currant rate

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
